legal_basis: Rule 400 of the Federal Court Rules
decision_reasoning: court has discretion to decide if costs are payable
factors like success in proceedings and conduct of parties
Claimants delayed the ratification vote and influenced changes in the electoral process
Band Council argues Claimants were unreasonable and caused undue costs
result_of_case: No costs were awarded to the Band Council
discretion_exercise: emphasizing the mediation's success and the community's progress
